text:
Celebrities got into the Easter spirit over the holiday weekend, sharing holiday wishes with fans on social media and posting photos of their own celebrations.

Reese Witherspoon is among those who decorated eggs, Taylor Swfit had an egg battle with hers, and Madonna captioned a photo with a cheeky “Don’t Put All Your Eggs In One Basket.” Even the smash Broadway musical Hamilton got in on the fun, sharing photos of fan-made #Hamileggs.

See other messages below from Mariah Carey, John Stamos, Ariel Winter, Dolly Parton, Queen Latifah, and more.

WANT MORE EW? Subscribe now to keep up with the latest in movies, television and music.
title: Easter 2016: Celebrities share messages on social media
